name: Jonathan Wells
tagline: Hands-on full-stack architect, engineer, mentor and leader.
body:
## Experience
### LifeLock, Mountain View, CA (AZ headquarters)
Hands-on Chief Architect (2015 - 2016)

Technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CoreOS, CentOS, Node.js, Go, Python, Java, iOS (Swift), Jenkins

### White Sky Inc, Mountain View, CA (acquired)
Hands-on Chief Architect (2013 - 2015)

Technologies: Docker, AWS, CoreOS, CentOS, MongoDB, Node.js, Python, Android (Java),  iOS (Objective-C, Swift), C#, Jenkins

### Tanjarine, Los Altos Hills, CA
Startup Architect (2013)

Technologies: Android (Java), AWS, CentOS, MariaDB, MongoDB, Python, Jenkins, Gitolite

### Caesars Entertainment Corporation, Las Vegas, NV
Senior Innovation Architect (2012 - 2013)

Technologies: AWS, Google AppEngine, Ubuntu, Python, Flask, Tornado, Django, Android (Java), MySQL, iOS (Objective-C)

### Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, WA
Senior Product Manager (2006 - 2012)

Visual Studio, Windows Phone

#### Architect Evangelist, (2005 - 2006)

Accelerate adoption of Microsoft’s Platform in the Media, Entertainment & Communication sectors.

#### Technical Product Manager, Developer Division (2002 - 2005)

.NET Compact Framework, Smart Client

#### Software Design Engineer / Test, C# Team (2000 - 2002)

Test automation engineering for Visual Studio, C# and the .NET Framework

### Quest Electronic Developments Pty Ltd, Adelaide Australia
Software Engineer (1997 - 2000)

World leader in integrated point of sale solutions to the hospitality and retail industries.

### Omnyx Pty Ltd, Adelaide Australia
Founder (1993 - 1996)

Software startup creating applications for the hospitality industry (hotels, clubs and pubs).

### Orb Enterprises Pty Ltd, Adelaide Australia
Founder (1993 - 1996)

On-site computer upgrade and repair - think Geek Squad (but in the 90’s).

## Education
Electrical and Electronic Engineering, University of Adelaide, Australia (1992 - 1993)
